mapper.sql: select i.id, i.create_at as createDate, i.modify_at as modifyDate, i.data_from as dataFrom, i.creator_id as creatorId, i.description, i.status, i.weight, i.url, i.modify_name as modifyName, i.clientpf as clientPf, i.type
mapper.select: from load_config_url i where i.clientpf=#{clientPf} and i.status=1 order by weight desc
